医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
RSV 疫苗：期待已久的突破现在有两种针对 60 岁以上老年人的疫苗可以预防呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV)，但一种保护幼儿的疫苗仍在开发中。 “期待已久的 RSV 疫苗”提供了 RSV 疫苗研究的最新情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/RSV-vaccines-A-long-awaited-breakthrough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/RSV-vaccines-A-long-awaited-breakthrough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb6814a6-4c9b-444f-98fc-311fadc5df84 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 14:02:44 -0400 RSV vaccines: A long-awaited breakthrough
伯明翰大学开发新工具以提高患者参与研究的程度得益于伯明翰大学针对长新冠病毒的工作开发的新工具，患者和公众将能够更轻松地参与有影响力的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/University-of-Birmingham-develops-new-tool-to-improve- Patient-involvement-in-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/University-of-Birmingham-develops-new-tool-to-improve-patent-involvement-in-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5f2c0a9-8c85-4c43-a165-6b826ac9f3dd Thu, 20 Jul 2023 13:50:21 -0400 University of Birmingham develops new tool to improve patient involvement in research
黑人癌症幸存者面临更高的心血管疾病风险美国癌症协会 (ACS) 研究人员的一项新研究发现，与白人癌症幸存者相比，美国黑人癌症幸存者死于心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Black-cancer-survivors-face-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Black-cancer-survivors-face-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=075cb1de-8062-4525-8801-95b1e26a1533 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 13:38:40 -0400 Black cancer survivors face higher risk of cardiovascular disease
细胞以波的形式进行交流以协调运动像我们一样，细胞也进行交流。嗯，以他们自己特殊的方式。细胞利用波作为共同语言，告诉彼此何时何地移动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Cells-communicate-in-waves-to-cooperative-movement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Cells-communicate-in-waves-to-cooperative-movement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fb57b4f-df9d-418b-8017-3a519be1aab8 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 13:24:28 -0400 Cells communicate in waves to coordinate movement
研究人员发现靶向细菌细胞壁的新方法细菌细胞壁必须不断重塑才能生长和分裂。这涉及裂解酶和肽聚糖合成的密切协调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-discover-new-way-to-target-bacterial-cell-wall.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-discover-new-way-to-target-bacterial-cell-wall.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d2fe47e-4770-4646-aa94-b4f4f0006f8f Thu, 20 Jul 2023 13:07:47 -0400 Researchers discover new way to target bacterial cell wall
高体温可能会促进肠道微生物群对抗病毒感染东京大学的研究人员揭示了高体温与病毒抵抗力增强之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/High-body-Temperature-may-boost-gut-microbiota-to-fight-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/High-body-Temperature-may-boost-gut-microbiota-to-fight-viral-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a369456-590b-4fe4-960d-3cf7b828b56e Thu, 20 Jul 2023 12:23:56 -0400 High body temperature may boost gut microbiota to fight viral infections
晚年志愿服务与更好的执行功能和情景记忆有关根据今天在荷兰阿姆斯特丹举行的 2023 年阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议上和网上发布的研究，晚年志愿服务与更好的认知功能相关，特别是更好的执行功能和情景记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Volunteering-in-late-life-linked-with-better-executive-function-and-episodic-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Volunteering-in-late-life- Associated-with-better-executive-function-and-episodic-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58c1d460-5e6f-4ffe-b0dd-793ad12ef215 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 12:15:55 -0400 Volunteering in late life associated with better executive function and episodic memory
研究人员利用 miRNA 表达谱和人工智能创建多类癌症诊断模型癌症是世界上最具破坏性的疾病之一。到 2023 年，预计仅在美国就会出现超过 190 万新癌症病例和 609,820 人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-create-a-multiclass-cancer-diagnostic-model-using-miRNA-express-profiles-and-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Researchers-create-a-multiclass-cancer-diagnostic-model-using-miRNA-express-profiles-and-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bf0ecbb-4229-40e0-b28c-c3f258c226d4 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 12:02:07 -0400 Researchers create a multiclass cancer diagnostic model using miRNA expression profiles and AI
积极身体内容可以拓宽女性理想体重的概念社交媒体如何有助于形成更加多样化的体型和外表吸引力概念？答案是身体积极的内容。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Body-positive-content-can-broaden-womens-concept-of-ideal-body-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Body-positive-content-can-broaden-womens-concept-of-ideal-body-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=602537f8-30a8-45b2-9b5d-6b12edb0a7a7 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 11:54:18 -0400 Body-positive content can broaden women's concept of ideal body weight
